question: Which of the following statements is false regarding Flow logs?

answers.A: Deleting a flow log disables the flow log service for the resource and it does not delete any existing flow log records or log streams
answers.B: You can create a flow log for Elastic Load Balancing and Amazon RDS
answers.C: You can create a flow log for a VPC, a subnet, or a network interface
answers.D: Deleting a flow log will delete any existing flow log records or log streams for CloudWatch
answers.E: Adding a new instance in a subnet(flow log enabled) will automatically starts collecting the flow logs for newly created network interfaces
